location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Pringle Riach, in charge of the Bushire Residency to Mountstuart Elphinstone, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Governor of Bombay that the officer in charge of the Bushire Residency has granted two sets of bills (No 14 and 15) on the Bombay Government in favour of Joseph Leizar, so that the demands of the Bushire Residency could be met.
